intro: Nardophyllum scoparium, commonly known as the mountain sandwort, is a flowering plant belonging to the family Montiaceae. Its leaves are often fleshy and succulent, adapted to conserve water in harsh environments. Nardophyllum scoparium is often used in herbal medicine for its purported therapeutic properties.
